pr_title: [DROOLS-5700] Implement range index in Alpha Network Compiler

timeline.message: [DROOLS-5700] Implement range index in Alpha Network Compiler

timeline.bodyText: I thought one of the optimisation of the ANC was to unwrap the alpha node and use the constraint directly, effectively inlining the call. Can you please double check?
timeline.author: lucamolteni

replies.bodyText: Yeah, I noticed that I don't need these AlphaNode variables! Actually I don't even need the internal constraints because we can get matching alphaNode's id from the range index and go to the next sink. I removed useless codes so now it's much simplified. Thanks!
replies.author: tkobayas
